availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Darwin M. Johnson (Ballard Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Married to Nancy Malinda Johnson in Ballard County, Kentucky, on November 15, 1853. Father of Lucy Johnson, George S. Johnson, Francis M. Johnson, Colisle Johnson, Udora Johnson, Beatrice Johnson, and Thomas Johnson. Resident in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville District, p. 29.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 3, p. 26.
